meanings.definition: The seed of the flax plant, used for its oil and as a source of fiber.
meanings.sent1: I added flaxseed to my smoothie for extra fiber.
meanings.sent2: The flaxseed oil is known for its health benefits.
meanings.sent3: The flaxseed jumped out of the bowl and started dancing!
meanings.sent4: Her hair shone like flaxseed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The flaxseed looked like tiny pebbles, ready to grow into plants.

meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Linum, cultivated for its seeds and fiber.
meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested flaxseed from the field.
meanings.sent2: Flaxseed plants need plenty of sunlight to grow well.
meanings.sent3: The flaxseed plant wore a tiny hat to protect itself from the sun.
meanings.sent4: The field of flaxseed swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The flaxseed plant stood tall, proud of its valuable seeds.
